divs: Sighting Detailsi wasnt exactly there at the scene...but i think this will help. i was stationed in new jersey, at fort dickson. i worked the day shift. one day there were reports of lights in the sky (this is actually on record of UFO sightings)and i was curious. on my way to my shift the next morning, the radio said that the government said it was a weather balloon. definate cover-up. one of my good friends, a big black woman whom i will not reveal her name, who worked the night shift that night, told me that she and another soldier stationed there saw the blue light hover over the fort, and then suddenly desccend to the ground. it landed on the airstrip! as soon as it happened the head of the fort said, "thats enough" and pulled them out of there. they were sent into seperate conceiled rooms and were to fill out papers on what they witnessed, saying that they were never allowed to speak of anything they saw. that was all she told me before i started my shift.
Summary: Blue light over Fort Dickson, New Jersy
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around February 28th 1983
